constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 206 (Tuesday, November 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. RICE of South Carolina:
H.R. 6092.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Section 8 of Article I of the Constitution
[Page H6711]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

title: To revise the standards for eligibility for community development block grant disaster recovery grants, and for other purposes.
